GV00maitrs_pu:6902: agne rāyo nṛtamasya prabhūtau bhūyāma te suṣṭutayaś ca vasvaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6903: sa id asteva pratidhād asiṣyañ śiśīta tejo 'yaso na dhārām /
GV00maitrs_pu:6904: citradhrajatir aratir yo aktor ver na druṣadvā raghupatmajaṃhāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6906: mathīd yad īṃ viṣṭo mātariśvā hotāraṃ viśvāpsuṃ viśvadevyam /
GV00maitrs_pu:6907: ni yaṃ dadhur manuṣyāsu vikṣu svar ṇa citraṃ vapuṣe vibhāvam //
GV00maitrs_pu:6908: ayaṃ sa yasya śarmann avobhir agner edhate jaritābhiṣṭau /
GV00maitrs_pu:6909: jyeṣṭhebhir yo bhānubhir ṛbhūṇāṃ paryeti parivīto vibhāvā //
GV00maitrs_pu:6910: adidyutat sv apāko vibhāvāgne yajasva rodasī urūcī /
GV00maitrs_pu:6911: āyuṃ na yaṃ namasā rātahavyā añjanti suprayasaṃ pañca janāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6912: sa no vibhāvā cakṣaṇir na vastor agnir vandāru vedyaś cano dhāt /
GV00maitrs_pu:6913: viśvāyur yo amṛto martyeṣu pary abhūd atithir jātavedāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6914: yo bhānubhir vibhāvā vibhāty agnir devebhir ṛtāvājasraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6915: ā yo vivāya sakhyā sakhibhyo 'parihvṛto atyo na saptiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6916: yad agna eṣā samitir bhavāti devī deveṣu yajatā yajatra /
GV00maitrs_pu:6917: ratnā ca yad vibhajāsi svadhāvo bhāgaṃ no atra vasumantaṃ vītāt //
GV00maitrs_pu:6918: etā te agna ucathāni vedho juṣṭāni santu manase hṛde ca /
GV00maitrs_pu:6919: śakema rāyaḥ sudhuro yamaṃ te 'dhi śravo devabhaktaṃ dadhānāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6920: vi pṛkṣo agne maghavāno aśyur vi sūrayo dadato viśvam āyuḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6921: sanema vājaṃ samitheṣv aryo bhāgaṃ deveṣu śravase dadhānāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6922: ā no gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhir mahān mahībhir ūtibhiḥ saraṇyan /
GV00maitrs_pu:6923: asme rayiṃ bahulaṃ saṃtarutraṃ suvācaṃ bhāgaṃ yaśasaṃ kṛdhī naḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6924: kurmas tā āyur ajaraṃ yad agne yathā yukto jātavedo na riṣyāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6925: athā vahāsi sumanasyamāno bhāgaṃ devebhyo haviṣaḥ sujāta //
GV00maitrs_pu:6926: haviṣīva bhajamāno nā ābhāg devebhyaḥ śikṣann uta mānuṣebhyaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6927: tvaṃ devānām asi yahva hotā sa enān yakṣīṣito yajīyān //MS_4,14.15//
GV00maitrs_pu:6928: agne dā dā no agne 'gnir dadāty annapate annasya no dehy agninā rayim aśnavat saṃsam id yuvase vṛṣan yās te //
GV00maitrs_pu:6929: yamo no gātuṃ prathamo viveda naiṣā gavyūtir apabhartavā u /
GV00maitrs_pu:6930: yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyur enā jajñānāḥ pathyā anu svāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6931: prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūrvebhir yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6932: ubhā rājānā svadhayā madantā yamaṃ paśyāsi varuṇaṃ ca devam //
GV00maitrs_pu:6933: aṅgirobhir āgahi yajñiyebhir yama vairūpair iha mādayasva /
GV00maitrs_pu:6934: vivasvantaṃ huve yaḥ pitā te 'smin yajñe barhiṣy ā niṣadya //
GV00maitrs_pu:6935: imaṃ yama prastaram ā hi sīdāṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6936: ā tvā mantrāḥ kaviśastā vahantv enā rājan haviṣā mādayasva //
GV00maitrs_pu:6937: mātalī kavyair yamo aṅgirobhir bṛhaspatir ṛkvabhir vāvṛdhānaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6938: yāṃś ca devā vāvṛdhur ye ca devānt svāhānye svadhayānye madanti //
GV00maitrs_pu:6939: pareyivāṃsaṃ pravato mahīr anu bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānam /
GV00maitrs_pu:6940: vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānāṃ yamaṃ rājānaṃ haviṣā duvasya //
GV00maitrs_pu:6941: yās te pūṣan nāvo antaḥ samudre hiraṇyayīr antarikṣe caranti /
GV00maitrs_pu:6942: tābhir yāsi dūtyaṃ sūryasya kāmena kṛtaḥ śrava ichamānaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6943: śukraṃ te anyad yajataṃ te anyat //
GV00maitrs_pu:6944: pūṣemā āśā anuveda sarvāḥ so asmaṃ abhayatamena meṣat /
GV00maitrs_pu:6945: svastidā āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīro 'prayuchan pura etu prajānan //
GV00maitrs_pu:6946: prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6947: ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan //
GV00maitrs_pu:6948: pūṣā subandhur diva ā pṛthivyā iḍas patir maghavā dasmavarcāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6949: yaṃ devāso adaduḥ sūryāyai kāmena kṛtaṃ tavasaṃ svañcam //
GV00maitrs_pu:6950: ajāśvaḥ paśupā vājapastyo dhiyaṃjinvo bhuvane viśve arpitaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6951: aṣṭrāṃ pūṣā śithirām udvarīvṛjat saṃcakṣāṇo bhuvanā deva īyate //MS_4,14.16//
GV00maitrs_pu:6952: yad devā devaheḍanaṃ yad vācānṛtam odima /
GV00maitrs_pu:6953: ādityās tasmān muñcatartasya tv enam āmutaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6955: tasmān na iha muñcata viśve devāḥ sajoṣasaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6957: kṛtān naḥ pāhy aṃhaso yat kiṃcānṛtam odima //
GV00maitrs_pu:6959: te no muñcantv enaso yat kiṃcānṛtam odima //
GV00maitrs_pu:6960: sajātaśaṃsād uta jāmiśaṃsāj jyāyasaḥ śaṃsād uta vā kanīyasaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6961: anādhṛṣṭaṃ devakṛtaṃ yad enas tasmāt tvam asmān jātavedo mumugdhi //
GV00maitrs_pu:6963: yad antarikṣaṃ pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ yan mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā jihiṃsima /
GV00maitrs_pu:6964: agnir nas tasmād enaso gārhapatyaḥ pramuñcatu duritāni yāni kāni ca cakṛma //
GV00maitrs_pu:6965: yena trito arṇavān nirbabhūva yena sūryaṃ tamaso niramoci /
GV00maitrs_pu:6966: yenendro viśvā ajahād arātīs tenāhaṃ jyotiṣā jyotir ānaśāna ayākṣi //
GV00maitrs_pu:6967: yad daivyam ṛṇam ahaṃ babhūva dhipsyaṃ vā saṃcakara janebhyaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6968: agnir nas tasmād indraś ca saṃvidānau pramuñcatām //
GV00maitrs_pu:6969: yat kusīdam apratītaṃ mayeha yena yamasya nidhinā carāvaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6970: etat tad agne anṛṇo bhavāmi jīvann eva prati hastānṛṇāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:6971: yad dhastābhyāṃ cakara kilbiṣāny akṣāṇāṃ vagmum avajighram āpaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6972: ugraṃ paśyāc ca rāṣṭrabhṛc ca tāny apsarasām anudattānṛṇāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:6973: ugraṃ paśyed rāṣṭabhṛt kilbiṣāni yad akṣavṛttam anudattam etat /
GV00maitrs_pu:6974: nem na ṛṇān ṛṇavān īpsamāno yamasya loke nidhir ajarāya //
GV00maitrs_pu:6976: imaṃ me varuṇa śrudhī havam adyā ca mṛḍaya /
GV00maitrs_pu:6978: tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānas tad āśāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6979: aheḍamāno varuṇeha bodhy uruśaṃsa mā nā āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6980: ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ śrathāya /
GV00maitrs_pu:6981: athā vayam āditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma //
GV00maitrs_pu:6982: ava te heḍo varuṇa namobhir ava yajñebhir īmahe havirbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6983: kṣayann asmabhyam asura pracetā rājann enāṃsi śiśrathaḥ kṛtāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:6984: tvaṃ no agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḍo 'vayāsisīṣṭhāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6985: yajiṣṭho vahnitamaḥ śośucāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi pramumugdhy asmat //
GV00maitrs_pu:6986: sa tvaṃ no agne 'vamo bhavotī nediṣṭho asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
GV00maitrs_pu:6987: avayakṣva no varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhi mṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi //
GV00maitrs_pu:6988: saṃkasuko vikasuko nirṛto yaś ca nisvanaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6989: te 'smad yakṣmam anāgaso dūrād dūram acīcatam //
GV00maitrs_pu:6990: nir yakṣmam acīcate kṛtyāṃ nirṛtiṃ cakāra /
GV00maitrs_pu:6991: tena yo 'smat samṛchātai tam asmai prasuvāmasi //
GV00maitrs_pu:6993: tena yo 'smat samṛchātai tam asmai prasuvāmasi //
GV00maitrs_pu:6994: saṃ varcasā payasā saṃ tanūbhir aganmahi manasā saṃ śivena /
GV00maitrs_pu:6995: tvaṣṭā sudatro vidadhātu rāyo 'nu no mārṣṭu tanvo yad viriṣṭam //MS_4,14.17//
GV00maitrs_pu:6996: śucī vo havyā marutaḥ śucīnāṃ śuciṃ hinomy adhvaraṃ śucibhyaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:6997: ṛtena satyam ṛtasāpa āyañ śucijanmānaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:6999: aṃseṣv ā marutaḥ khādayo vo vakṣaḥsu rukmā upaśiśriyāṇāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:7000: vi vidyuto na vṛṣṭibhī rucānā anu svadhām āyudhair yachamānāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:7002: ime turaṃ maruto rāmayantīme sahaḥ sahasā ānamanti /
GV00maitrs_pu:7003: ime śaṃsaṃ vanuṣyato nipānti guru dveṣo araruṣe dadhanti //
GV00maitrs_pu:7004: arā ived acaramā aheva praprajāyante akavā mahobhiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:7005: pṛśneḥ putrā upamāso rabhiṣṭhāḥ svayā matyā marutaḥ saṃmimikṣuḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:7008: agnīṣomā yo adya vām idaṃ vacaḥ saparyati /
GV00maitrs_pu:7009: tasmai dhattaṃ suvīryaṃ gavāṃ poṣaṃ svaśvyam //
GV00maitrs_pu:7010: ānyaṃ divo mātariśvā jabhārāmathnād anyaṃ pari śyeno adreḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:7011: agnīṣomā brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānoruṃ yajñāya cakrathur ulokam //
GV00maitrs_pu:7012: agnīṣomā ya āhutiṃ yo vāṃ dāśād dhaviṣkṛtim /
GV00maitrs_pu:7013: sa prajayā suvīryaṃ viśvam āyur vyaśnavat //
GV00maitrs_pu:7014: agnīṣomā haviṣaḥ prasthitasya vītaṃ haryataṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
GV00maitrs_pu:7015: suśarmāṇā svavasā hi bhūtam athā dhattaṃ yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:7016: ā carṣaṇiprā vṛṣabho janānāṃ rājā kṛṣṭīnāṃ puruhūta indraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:7017: stutaḥ śravasyann avasopa madrig yuktvā harī vṛṣaṇāyāhy arvāk //
GV00maitrs_pu:7019: taṃ sadhrīcīr ūtayo vṛṣṇyāni pauṃsyāni niyutaḥ saścur indram /
GV00maitrs_pu:7020: samudraṃ na sindhava ukthaśuṣmā uruvyacasaṃ girā āviśanti //
GV00maitrs_pu:7021: satyam it tan na tvāvaṃ anyo 'stīndra devo na martyo jyāyān /
GV00maitrs_pu:7022: ahann ahiṃ pariśayānam arṇo 'vāsṛjo apo achā samudram //
GV00maitrs_pu:7025: sa śevṛdham adhidhā dyumnam asme mahi kṣatraṃ janāṣāḍ indra tavyam /
GV00maitrs_pu:7026: rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ svapatyā iṣe dhāḥ
